Package org.unibl.etf.epj2.reports

Class Report

java.lang.Object
org.unibl.etf.epj2.reports.Report
public class Report extends Object
Represents a report generated from rental bills, including methods for calculating various matrics. This class reads rental bills, group them by date, and provides methods to calculate total income, discounts, maintenance costs and other business-related metrics.

The class assumes that rental bills are stored in files with specific formats and that these files are located in a directory specified by RentalCalculator.FOLDER_NAME.

Author:
Tamara Kosovac
